content: FRANKFURT NXP has completed its nearly $12 billion deal to buy Freescale  doubling the proportion of auto-related revenue to 40 percent to create the world's top maker of automotive electronics  it said on Monday. Faltering demand in computer and phone markets  once semiconductor industry mainstays  have fueled a year-long merger wave as firms look to formerly unappealing areas like auto electronics for sales growth.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: NXP completes deal to buy Freescale and create top auto chipmaker

content: July 30 NXP  set to become Europe's largest chipmaker after buying U.S.-based Freescale  booked an 89 percent rise in second-quarter net income driven by strong sales of payment chips  but forecast weak third-quarter growth in its auto unit.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: UPDATE 2-Chipmaker NXP posts 89 pct rise in Q2 net profit  flags weaker Q3

content: NXP Semiconductors NV   set to become Europe's largest chipmaker once it closes its acquisition of U.S.-based Freescale   reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit  helped by strong demand for its automotive electronics.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: Chipmaker NXP's quarterly adjusted profit beats estimates

content: July 29 NXP Semiconductors NV  set to become Europe's largest chipmaker once it closes its acquisition of U.S.-based Freescale  reported an 11.6 percent rise in quarterly revenue  helped by strong demand for its automotive electronics.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: NXP quarterly revenue rises 11.6 pct

content: * Stora Enso and NXP to develop intelligent packaging solutions
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: BRIEF-Stora Enso  NXP to develop smart packaging

content: NEW YORK  March 12 The loan market received another boost this week as drugmaker Abbvie and semiconductor company NXP boosted U.S. M&A volume to $152.7 billion so far this year  including completed and deals in the pipeline.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: TRLPC: Abbvie and NXP boost M&A volumes

content: BARCELONA The merger of NXP and Freescale will bring together two highly diversified chipmakers to create a more focused  leading player in two high-growth markets - automotive electronics and security  NXP's top executive said on Wednesday.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: NXP deal means security to come built-in on far more devices: CEO

content: NEW YORK Chip maker NXP Semiconductors NV has agreed to buy smaller peer Freescale Semiconductor Ltd and merge operations in a deal valuing the combined company at over $40 billion.
name: NXP Semiconductors NV
title: NXP to buy Freescale  create $40 billion company
